## BronziteClient.decorate() method

Adds a property to the client.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
decorate(prop: string, value: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  prop | string | The property to set. |
|  value | any | The value to set the property to. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
